meanings.definition: Not involving or related to sexual desire or arousal.
meanings.sent1: The children's cartoon was nonerotic, suitable for all ages.
meanings.sent2: The documentary focused on nonerotic topics like wildlife conservation.
meanings.sent3: The nonerotic nature of the painting made it perfect for a family-friendly exhibit.
meanings.sent4: Her nonerotic approach to storytelling captivated audiences in a different way.
meanings.sent5: The nonerotic atmosphere of the library encouraged quiet contemplation and study.

meanings.definition: Lacking any sexual or sensual elements.
meanings.sent1: The nonerotic novel was a refreshing change from the usual romance stories.
meanings.sent2: The art exhibition featured nonerotic sculptures that focused on abstract forms.
meanings.sent3: The nonerotic massage oil had a surprisingly calming effect on the skin.
meanings.sent4: His nonerotic dance moves were more about expression than seduction.
meanings.sent5: The nonerotic fragrance of the flowers filled the room with a subtle sweetness.
